meanings.definition: the 500th anniversary of a significant event
meanings.sent1: The quincentennials of the town's founding were celebrated with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: The quincentennials of historical battles are often marked with special exhibitions.
meanings.sent3: At the quincentennials of the library, they had a book-themed cake!
meanings.sent4: The quincentennials of inventions remind us of human progress over time.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the quincentennials of ancient ruins brings history to life.

meanings.definition: relating to a period of 500 years
meanings.sent1: The quincentennials celebration included displays of artifacts from the past 500 years.
meanings.sent2: The quincentennials clock was designed to chime every 500 years.
meanings.sent3: The quincentennials party had decorations representing different centuries.
meanings.sent4: The quincentennials timeline showed key events from the last 500 years.
meanings.sent5: The quincentennials exhibit showcased advancements over the centuries.
